```{r}

# treatment group
indo_rct %>% group_by(rx) %>% count()

```




```{r age}


indo_rct %>% group_by(rx) %>% summarise(age_mean = round(mean(age),1),
                                        sd = round(sd(age),1))

```

```{r}

head(indo_rct)


indo_rct %>% group_by(rx,gender) %>% count() %>% group_by(rx) %>%
             mutate(percent = round(n/sum(n),2)) 

```
